body.p: I beg leave most respectfully to State to Your honor. that George Wallace a discharged Soldier and a man of Color has has this day been brought before me charged with the offense of Carrying Concealed deadly weapons -- It was clearly proven that he had a pistol concealed upon his person -- I was forced from the proof to inflict the fine of $50. and Costs under the Statute and the city ordinance -- I believe that his case is one of extreme hard ship and would therefore most respectfully Solicit your honor to interpose Executive Clemency and release him from the fine imposed The officers release to him the Costs which haver accrued against him

Novr. 20th. 1865
Respy Geo W Gwin J P F C
W. S. Bacon
David Kirkpatrick
G, W, Chambers
